description:
Set up tubeless tires at home with this high volume floor pump. With its integrated pressure tank, the Tubeless Blaster can help you thump tubeless tire beads into place. A clever universal pump-head fits both Schrader and presta valves, and even has a lever pressure release for the air tank. This pump will help you keep all the family’s bikes, strollers, wheelbarrows, etc. pumped up and ready to roll.

  • Internal air tank for releasing a single high pressure blast, simply lock the valve with the lever on the pump-head, pressurize the tank, then flip the lever to release the pressure; great for setting up tubeless tires
  • Universal pump-head fits Schrader and presta valves
  • 6cm pressure gauge is easy to see and has an indicator to let you know when you get to your set pressure
  • Ergonomic steel handle
  • 128cm hose means less repositioning of the pump and less spinning wheels to get to the valve
  • Broad base with non-slip pads keeps the pump anchored in place while in use
name: MEC Tubeless Blaster Floor Pump
